text: Tyasadina kapati purusa ra striharu mominaharusita bhannechan ki hamro pratiksa ta gara ki hamile pani timro prakasabata kehi prakasa hasila garaum ta uniharusita bhanine cha ki timi pachadi pharkera ja'u, (tyaham) aru prakasa khoja, ani uniharuko bicama e'uta parkhala ubhya'ine cha, jasama dhoka pani hunecha usako bhitri bhagama (allahako) krpa hunecha ra bahira sajaya hunecha
